A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went to the movie last week and loved it.  It was not only visually gorgeous but quite intriguing. I came into the movie without expectations that the movie OWED me my own personal conclusions. I'm currently disgusted at the trolls that came in to place 1/2 star ratings. Such ratings are wildly inaccurate. This film is a work of love from people that respect the source material enough to not give viewers Empire version 2.0.
